alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 7:21PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Prowers, Baca, east central Las Animas and southeastern Bent Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 720 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms across far southeast Colorado primarily in Baca County, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Walsh, Pritchett, Vilas, Campo, Kim, Two Buttes, Two Buttes Reservoir and Stonington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
